item.title: Understanding Quantum Field Theory
item.description:
Simple video to understand

Field

Field is quantity or measurement assigned to all points in space.

Base Assumptions: Up for discussion

Field is everywhere. When we say it’s zero field here, it means some base equilibrium field is there. Physical existence is still debated

Electromagnetic Field

Whenever light passes through the field changes and we see change in values. Default equilibrium is always there.

There physical existence is still debated.

What is Scaler

What is Vector

What is Quantum

Quantum Field

Quantum field is quantum measurment assigned to every point in space like we have for

Quantum Field theory

Quantum electrodynamics
